item.description: ğŸ“˜ Python Day 1 Learning Document âœ… Topics Practiced Variables & Data Types Basic Functions Lists Dictionaries Nested Data Access Control Flow (if-else) ğŸ§ Session Summary and Corrections ğŸ”¹ Variables & Strings name = "ajmal" # âœ… Valid string assignment age = 28 # âœ… Integer assignment ajn = '2a' # âœ… String with alphanumeric content âŒ Mistakes: name = "ajmal # âŒ Missing closing quote â€” causes `SyntaxError: EOL while scanning string literal` ajn = 2a # âŒ Invalid syntax â€” 2a is not a valid variable assignment ğŸ”¹ Printing and Types print(name) # ajmal print(type(name)) # <type 'str'> (Python 2.
